  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>15219</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Cos'è l'Unione Europea?</string>
            <string language="en">What is the European Union?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Was ist der europäische Anschluß?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Quelle est l'union européenne ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que é a união européia?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ποια είναι η Ευρωπαϊκή Ένωση;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Cuál es la unión europea?</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Questo è un esercizio di completamento su cosa rappresenta l'Unione europea e sui suoi obiettivi.</string>
            <string language="en">This is a gap-fill exercise about what the European Union represents and its objectives.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist Abstand-füllen Übung über, was der 
europäische Anschluß und seine Lernziele darstellt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est intervalle-remplissent exercice au sujet de ce que 
représente l'union européenne et ses objectifs.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Isto é abertura-enche o exercício sobre o que a união 
européia representa e seus objetivos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι μια άσκηση χάσμα-αφθονίας για αυτό που η 
Ευρωπαϊκή Ένωση αντιπροσωπεύει και οι στόχοι της.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Éste es boquete-llena ejercicio sobre lo que representa 
la unión europea y sus objetivos.</string>
          </description>
        </general>

          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-t-lre">11-19</string>
            <string language="en">11-19</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Obiettivo:- gli alunni dimostreranno la loro conoscenza su cosa rappresenta l'UE così come sui suoi obiettivi. Metodo didattico:lettura attiva ( leggere e svolgere un esercizio interattivo) e feedback rapido. Strumento di presentazione dei contenuti: pagina web( testo, grafica, e link)sull'UE ed i suoi obiettivi. Strumento di valutazione: esercizio di completamento, con limite di tempo e feed back rapido</string>
            <string language="en">Objective: 
- pupils will demonstrate knowledge of what the EU represents as well as its objectives

Teaching method: active learning (reading + doing an interactive exercise)  and rapid feedback

Content presentation tool: web page (text, graphics and hyperlinks) about EU and its objectives 

Assessment tool: gap-fill exercise with a time limit and rapid feedback</string>
          </description>
        </educational>
